questions.text: Have I shown joy in others’ success or resented their achievements?
Have I supported my children and spouse without jealousy?
Have I compared my family's life to others with envy?
Have I affirmed the good in others rather than criticize?
Have I encouraged my children to love and serve others?
Have I spoken kindly about people even when I disagree?
Have I been generous with time and affection toward my family?
Have I rejoiced in others’ blessings or silently wished them less?
Have I loved sacrificially without seeking something in return?
Have I withheld help due to jealousy or pride?
Have I worked hard to provide for my family?
Have I avoided my responsibilities at home or work?
Have I shown laziness in leading my family spiritually?
Have I neglected time with my children due to distraction or fatigue?
Have I left burdens for my spouse that I should have helped with?
Have I used free time well or wasted it excessively?
Have I avoided self-improvement or prayer out of indifference?
Have I modeled strong work ethic and consistency?
Have I helped my children learn responsibility by example?
Have I completed tasks I promised to do for my family?
Have I honored my wife in thought, word, and action?
Have I looked at others with lust or entertained impure thoughts?
Have I viewed media that disrespects the dignity of the body?
Have I made excuses for sexual sin rather than strive for virtue?
Have I taught my children respect for the body and boundaries?
Have I encouraged a culture of purity in my home?
Have I been faithful emotionally and physically to my spouse?
Have I made light of sins of lust or treated them casually?
Have I sought God’s grace through prayer to resist temptation?
Have I remembered that my body is a temple of the Holy Spirit?
Have I been harsh or impatient with my spouse or children?
Have I yelled or lost control in my home?
Have I reacted to stress with anger instead of prayer?
Have I held grudges or refused to forgive family members?
Have I corrected with love or in frustration?
Have I modeled gentleness and peace under pressure?
Have I been slow to speak and quick to listen?
Have I repented to my family after acting out in anger?
Have I taught my children to handle conflict with kindness?
Have I asked the Holy Spirit to increase patience in me?
Have I prioritized money or possessions over people?
Have I modeled generosity with our resources?
Have I supported charities or causes that reflect God’s love?
Have I complained about what we lack instead of thanking God?
Have I shared freely without expecting something in return?
Have I been selfish with time or hobbies over my family's needs?
Have I shown kindness to strangers, coworkers, and in-laws?
Have I corrected others harshly instead of with charity?
Have I spoken gently to my wife and children?
Have I placed my family’s spiritual wealth above material wealth?
Have I overindulged in food, drink, or entertainment?
Have I practiced moderation in habits and spending?
Have I modeled self-control in technology use at home?
Have I resisted the urge to buy things I don’t need?
Have I spent more time on screens than with my children?
Have I taught temperance by example in speech and behavior?
Have I consumed alcohol or substances in a disordered way?
Have I prioritized prayer and presence over distraction?
Have I shown that joy does not depend on possessions?
Have I led my family with temperate leadership?
Have I admitted when I was wrong to my spouse or kids?
Have I listened to others with openness or insisted on my way?
Have I accepted correction with grace?
Have I given God credit for my blessings?
Have I asked for forgiveness when I failed as a father?
Have I let others have the last word or insisted on being right?
Have I avoided showing off my talents or accomplishments?
Have I prayed daily for wisdom as a husband and father?
Have I placed my ego above family peace?
Have I sought to serve quietly without recognition?
